original_text: And Jesus said to him, “What do you want me to do for you?” And the blind man said to him, “Rabbi, let me recover my sight.”
korean_text: 예수께서 말씀하여 이르시되 네게 무엇을 하여 주기를 원하느냐 맹인이 이르되 선생님이여 보기를 원하나이다

sentences.original_text: “What do you want me to do for you?”
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 너를 위해 무엇을 해주기를 원하느냐?

sentences.original_text: And the blind man said to him,
